text:
Who could have thought that something as ordinary as an egg could go on an actual record-breaking spree?
The iconic egg is taking Instagram by a storm and for all the right reasons. On January 5, an account that goes by the name of Egg Gang aimed at breaking the record of Kylie Jenner with an image of an egg.
In just a few days, the post went on to gain 36.9 million likes and beat the post of her daughter's birth announcement, which had over 18 million, as the most-liked photo on Instagram.
(Also read: 9 Most Liked Instagram Posts Of Celebrities That Shattered Records)
The post on 5th January read: “Let’s set a world record together and get the most liked post on Instagram"
And in no time, they registered victory. Their next caption read:
“Beating the current world record held by Kylie Jenner (18 million)! We got this #LikeTheEgg #EggSoldiers #EggGang.”
The egg is unstoppable and it has registered another prominent victory. Dethroning Despacito music video too, which had 31.5 million likes.
Screengrab
Don't Miss 12.5 K SHARES 5.5 K SHARES 3.4 K SHARES 3.1 K SHARES 2.5 K SHARES
The egg is unstoppable and how!
title: After Breaking Kylie Jenner's Record, The Iconic Egg Breaks Despacito Music Video's Record
description: Who could have thought that something as ordinary as an egg could go on an actual record-breaking spree? The iconic egg is taking Instagram by a storm and for all the right reasons. On January 5, an account that goes by the name of Egg Gang aimed at breaking the record of Kylie Jenner with an image of an egg.
